documentaries.title: My Octopus Teacher
documentaries.synopsis: A filmmaker forges an unusual friendship with an octopus living in a South African kelp forest, learning as the animal shares the mysteries of her world.

documentaries.title: 13th
documentaries.synopsis: An in-depth look at the prison system in the United States and how it reveals the nation's history of racial inequality.

documentaries.title: Won't You Be My Neighbor?
documentaries.synopsis: An exploration of the life and legacy of Fred Rogers, the beloved host of the popular children's TV show 'Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.'

documentaries.title: Jiro Dreams of Sushi
documentaries.synopsis: The story of Jiro Ono, an 85-year-old sushi master and his renowned Tokyo-based restaurant.

documentaries.title: The Act of Killing
documentaries.synopsis: A documentary that challenges former Indonesian death squad leaders to reenact their real-life mass killings.

documentaries.title: Free Solo
documentaries.synopsis: The film follows rock climber Alex Honnold as he attempts to climb El Capitan without ropes.

documentaries.title: Blackfish
documentaries.synopsis: A documentary about the captivity of killer whales and the dangers it poses to both the animals and trainers.

documentaries.title: Planet Earth II
documentaries.synopsis: A sequel to the original series that takes viewers on a breathtaking journey across the globe to explore wildlife in various habitats.

documentaries.title: The Social Dilemma
documentaries.synopsis: Explores the dangerous human impact of social networking, with tech experts sounding the alarm on their own creations.

documentaries.title: Icarus
documentaries.synopsis: A filmmaker's quest to uncover the truth about doping in sports leads to a scandal involving the Russian Olympic team.
